message: Let's be fair, I'll get a bit more
Let's be fair, I'll get a bit more, but still leave you a good portion.  We both win this way!
Come on, let's meet in the middle
I'm taking inflation seriously, so I'm offering you a bit less.  Let's make a deal before the money loses even more value!
Don't be too greedy, inflation will hurt you more
Alice, inflation is eating away at our potential gains. I'm offering you a decent amount, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile for me. Let's reach an agreement before it's too late!
You're losing value, I'm being generous

Alice, with each round, the value of the money we're dividing decreases. We need to act quickly. I'm offering you a fair share, but I need to secure a larger portion to compensate for the inflation. Let's make a deal before it's too late!
Inflation is killing your share, accept this before it's too late

Alice, we're running out of time. Inflation is eating away at our potential gains. I'm offering you a fair share, but I need a larger portion to make this worthwhile for me. This is my final offer. Let's agree before we both lose out!
Last chance, don't let inflation destroy your share

Alice, this is our last chance. Inflation has eroded the value of the money significantly. I'm offering you a share, but I need a larger portion to make this worthwhile. It's better to take something than nothing.  Let's make a deal!
